alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Southern High Plains; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 14 at 12:35AM MDT until March 16 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches over north-central Montana, and 4 to 7 inches over the Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass area as well as the Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains, Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass, Cascade County below 5000ft, Judith Basin County and Judith Gap and Southern High Plains. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Southern High Plains; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass
